game.name: Tower of Hell
game.creator: YXCeptional Studios
game.description: Tower of Hell is a fast-paced obby game where players race to the top of a randomly generated tower without checkpoints, testing their skill, timing, and patience.

mechanics.climbing: Players must climb obstacles and platforms to reach the top of the tower.
mechanics.random_towers: Each round features a randomly generated tower layout.
mechanics.no_checkpoints: Falling means starting over from the bottom; there are no checkpoints by default.
mechanics.modifiers: Rounds may have special modifiers like low gravity, speed changes, or invisibility.

tips: Take your time and focus on precision jumps.
Watch other players to learn obstacle patterns.
Use shift lock for better camera control.
Practice each type of obstacle to improve skill.
Stay calm after falling to avoid mistakes.
rules: Respect other players; intentional griefing is discouraged.
